extractFactDictList.question: Why was the All-American Girls Professional Baseball League (AAGPBL) formed?
extractFactDictList.sentence: In response, the All-American Girls Professional Baseball League (AAGPBL) was formed in 1943 to provide entertainment for soldiers stationed overseas.

extractFactDictList.question: What role did the AAGPBL play in challenging gender stereotypes?
extractFactDictList.sentence: Firstly, they provided an opportunity for women to participate in a traditionally male-dominated sport, challenging gender stereotypes and paving the way for future generations of female athletes.
